statements: DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe' AND treatment_plan = 'Physical Therapy';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND medication_regimen LIKE '%insulin%';
DELETE FROM patient_medications WHERE compliance = FALSE;

DELETE FROM patient_medications
WHERE medication_id = 3 AND compliance = FALSE;

DELETE FROM medications
WHERE dosage = '10mg' AND frequency = 'Twice daily';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM patient_treatments WHERE treatment_id = 3 AND patient_id = 5;
